il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.core.dataset.visualization.html

Class TextFormatModification

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.core.dataset.visualization.html.TextFormatModification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TextFormatModification
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represent the format modification of html text relative to containing element. You can nest multiple TextFormatModification formatting.
    See Also:
